org.pac4j.core.util
Class InitializableObject

java.lang.Object
  org.pac4j.core.util.InitializableObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseClient, Clients
public abstract class InitializableObject
extends Object

This class is an object that can be (re-)initialized through the init() and the reinit() methods, the internalInit() must be implemented in sub-classes.

Since:
1.4.0
Author:
Jerome Leleu

 void init()
          Initialize the object.
protected abstract  void internalInit()
          Internal initialization of the object.
 void reinit()
          Force (again) the initialization of the object.
